bug.author: laurencedev
bug.description:
When is not set, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/b39cd06249213220e802bb64260727711d9fc98c/modules/core/src/parallel.cpp#L803>const char* cv::currentParallelFramework()</denchmark-link> returns , which leads to exception in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/82c477c9f7d5a2cc6f70b51d61584a2dca605c8c/modules/ts/src/ts.cpp#L937>void SystemInfoCollector::OnTestProgramStart(const testing::UnitTest&)</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>More details/reproduction</denchmark-h>
Please ref <denchmark-link:http://answers.opencv.org/question/198115/failed-to-run-the-test-of-test_fastcpp-on-windows-with-mingw-w64/>This</denchmark-link>
